name: Hell Tower Lite
description:
*Hell tower TRPG game"
Build your own resumé to survive from the hellhole of unemployment!
Jump into hell, hunt countless demons, earn various certificates and, ultimately, get a damn job!
dungeon game, RPG game

*'Hell tower' paid version: No advertising, Acquire coin twice, experience twice.
* Caution: When you delete a game, it is cleared with the saved data.
===============================================================
Synopsis:30 years have passed since the war with the Hell Overlord.
After the war, an immense baby boom occurs, and humanity faces an another hell.
The hell of employment!
Too many people were trying to get a job. The competition has gotten intense more than ever, and now you could barely apply for a documentation if you had killed 2-3 devils.
The young ones does not hesitate jumping into hell, only to get a job. They all head to Hell Tower to slay the Devil.

1. An RPG game with simple controls!
2. 3 main Towers: Demon Trainee’s Tower(100F), Monster’s Central Tower(500F), The High Monarch’s Helltower(1000F)
3. Recruit various coworkers, and form your own squad!
4. Build a monstrous career, have an awesome interview and try to get the best job possible!
